The tweeting advice now excerpts from the speech of President Dilma during the inauguration of the new Minister of Education, Renato Janine.
RT @blogplanalto: #AoVivo President @dilmabr speaks in the possession of the Minister of Education, Renato Janine Ribeiro: http://t.co/QXSDmut0XM
I thank and wish Cid Gomes every success in his new personal projects. #PosseMEC
Renato Janine will not lack the dedication and competence necessary to lead the Ministry of Education. #PosseMEC
We are building a university with style, face and the colors of the Brazilian people. #PosseMEC
We have never had so much diversity in our school and college benches. We have done a lot and we will do much more. #PosseMEC
The pre-salt is not promise, it's reality. Today, 669,000 barrels of oil per day are already extracted from the pre-salt fields. #PosseMEC
We can not deceive ourselves: what is in dispute is the form of distribution of the pre-salt and who gets the bulk. #PosseMEC
Who will be with the greatest part will be the health and education of this Country. That is what is under discussion, a model of sharing or concession. #PosseMEC
I assure Brazilians that the need to promote adjustments in our economy will not affect the essential and structuring programs of the MEC.
We remain committed to the goal of universal access to education for children aged 4 and 5 by 2016. #PosseMEC
We will continue to expand the supply of full-time education; the second stage of #Pronatec, we will give emphasis to the Young Apprentice. #PosseMEC
There will be no retreat in our policy of guaranteeing access to higher education for our young people. #PosseMEC
Science Without Borders will continue to bring young people to study in the best universities in the world. #PosseMEC
It will be like an "Educating Country" that Brazil will take the indispensable step to become, finally, a Country developed and just with its people.
We propose a national effort to qualify basic education to change the way we teach and learn in Brazil. #PosseMEC
The first of these axes will be the construction of cooperative federalism in basic education. #PosseMEC
The second axis is the change in the curricular and pedagogical paradigm of basic education. #PosseMEC
The third axis is to have well-qualified, well-paid and stimulated teachers and directors. #PosseMEC
The fourth axis will be to stimulate the use of technologies and techniques in the training process. #PosseMEC
Who could be more appropriate to lead this transformation at this moment than a teacher? #PosseMEC
To consolidate the construction of this utopia of a homeland that educates its children and young people, I invited a teacher and a passionate for education.
Renato Janine Ribeiro is a happy novelty: an educating minister for an Educating Country. #PosseMEC
I wish the new minister a lot of success at work, in which you can count on me always and with all the other ministers. #PosseMEC

Respect: Every Brazilian citizen knows the meaning of this principle well. And most value it and value it. #HumanizaRedes
Growing part of our interactions c / family, friends and even c / o gov, has occurred in the digital environment, q is fast and thought provoking.
As an extension of our real life, the virtual world should also be governed by similar ethical, behavioral and civic rules.
In Brazil, social networks have been the scene of offensive, prejudiced, discriminatory and intolerant manifestations.
Hidden in anonymity, some people feel at ease to express all kinds of aggression and spread of lies. #HumanizaRedes
This is the challenge that brings us here, for the launch of the National Pact to Confront Human Rights Violations on the Internet.
We have the urgent task of reconciling freedom of expression and information, with the guarantee of individual rights (...)
(...) respect for diversity and the fight against discrimination in all its forms. #HumanizaRedes
We are creating the first Human Rights Ombudsman online and, through the #HumanizaRedes portal, the complaints will be received.
A picture of the pies Sam and I baked with apprentices at Brains Brewery, Cardiff. Sam's is the neat one... http://t.co/3CMN64gKBJ
I welcome the support of @facebook, @twitter and @google, which will make the campaign visible on their networks. #HumanizaRedes
Brazil is a protagonist in this new world of the internet. We are outstanding users of the new media (...)
(...) and we are acting to be, more and more, examples of respect for individual rights and expression on digital platforms.
I invite everyone to participate in the public consultation that will provide for the regulation of #MarcoCivil. #HumanizaRedes
#HumanizaRedes is + a step to strengthen the internet as a democratic space and freedom of expression, in a scenario of respect for HD.
A free and open internet should not be a space for the spread of intolerance and prejudice. #HumanizaRedes
The government has an unwavering commitment to freedom of expression and manifestation. #HumanizaRedes
We are in favor of good debate, respect and democratic coexistence among all. #HumanizaRedes
We preach freedom and democracy, and we want an internet that shares respect and strengthens rights and duties. #HumanizaRedes
